basics.summary: Product-minded architect and hands-on software engineer with 13 yrs. experience building and delivering large scale distributed Data and Machine Learning Systems across Finance, Telecom & Technology sectors - I help organizations innovate, accelerate growth, manage risk better, reduce cost and achieve competitive strategic differentiation.

highlights: Led Google Cloud's data analytics in South East Asia

Delivery Governance oversight across multiple practices - AI/ML, Data Analytics, Infrastructure, Security, etc. ( > $15m)

work.name: Standard Chartered Bank, Singapore
highlights: Conceptualized and built Retail Bank's data platform across 11 markets and 1200 users, significantly reduced ML model deployment time.
Created credit downgrade & default prediction models based on news trends and social influencers for over 15,000 named entities.
Formulated risk scoring models based on customer's social media profile attributes, photos, videos, and neighborhood metrics.

Defined technology strategy and roadmaps for Bank's External/3rd party data management, Data Partnership & Ecosystems, Data Monetization, Marketing Automation (Martech), Customer Experience, Data Privacy, Explainable AI (XAI), Data Sovereignty and Cloud adoption

work.name: Teradata / Think Big Analytics, Singapore
highlights: Designed and developed 5 global Data Lakes with scalable ETL pipelines, handling up to 1.2 PB per hour and 40K daily files.
Engineered a low latency real-time in-memory platform, processing over 2.5 million events per second.
Built a real-time fraud detection ML system for a leading bank, reducing false positives by 60% and increasing detection rates by 70%.
Successfully built and upgraded multiple Hadoop clusters on Cloud/On-prem, ranging between 150-250 nodes.

work.name: UTU, Singapore
highlights: Built foundational services and partner integrations for the maiden launch of UTU in Thailand.
Developed a low latency (<25 μs) transaction processing module for bank mainframe integration.

work.name: Truckaurbus Marketplace, India
highlights: Scaled Truckaurbus from inception to operation across 15 cities, securing partnerships with over 25 OEMs, Banks, and NBFCs, achieving 240K unique visitors per day.
Architected the core marketplace and auctioning platform, alongside developing a dealers' lead generation network and ad-serving platform.
